Sentence: Upon completion of amalgamation the shareholders of GSML would receive 1 equity share of Rs.10 each of ZIL for every one share of GSML held by them on record date to be fixed by ZIL.

Sentence: The proposed amalgamation and the swap ratio of 1:1 were price sensitive information as prescribed under Regulation 2(ha)(v) of the Insider Trading Regulations.

Label: subjective observation

Label: statutory fact
Sentence: As per Regulation 11(2) if an acquirer together with PACs holds 55% or more but less that 75% of shares or voting rights of target company in present case GSML, they shall No acquire any additional shares unless they make a public announcement.

Label: statutory fact
Sentence: The second proviso to Regulation 11(2) provides conditions where acquisition can be made even without making public announcement.

Label: statutory fact
Sentence: The first condition which is in issue is that acquisition can be made even without making public announcement if shares are acquired in normal segment on stock exchange but the same should No be bulk deals block deals……

Label: material fact

Label: material fact
Sentence: The said purchase transactions were executed as Bulk Deals which is defined in SEBI Cir MRD DOP SE Cir-19 05 dated September 02, 2005.

Label: related fact
Sentence: Bulk deals means all transactions in a scrip (on an exchange) where total quantity of shares bought sold is more than 0.5% of the number of equity shares of the company (GSML) listed on the exchange.

Label: material fact
Sentence: The Noticees executed transactions on February 09 10, 2010 as bulk deals.

Sentence: I have noted that they have also submitted a report under Regulation 3(4) to SEBI on April 5, 2011.

Label: subjective observation

Label: subjective observation
